plot: In the battle for supremacy in Consume (Console) continent between parodical Segua (Sega) Kingdom and Ninteldo (Nintendo) Empire, the light-footed Gear (Sonic) appeared to defend his kingdom from the threat of Ninteldo's powerful emperor, Marcus (Mario).
opening_theme: "retrospective world" by Hiro Shimono and Nobuhiko Okamoto
ending_theme: "0 to 1 no Hana (０と１の花)" by Izumi Kitta and Suzuko Mimori
